name: Siames: Puzzle Heritage Game
description:
An entertaining online game based in the unique cultural and natural settings of Unesco World Heritage site from Thailand, "Sukhothai Historical Park".

Help protect and preserve our past.

This videogames designed for educational objectives – appear as a new tool to learn cultural content in an engaging way.

Learning cultural heritage by games-based learning.

Supported: Cultural Heritage Game Jam  #CHGJ2021
